Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line  trains are standing at California due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line  trains are standing at California due to a mechanical problem on a train. 

Shuttle buses are available between Damen and Jefferson Park to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #56 Milwaukee buses.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/62nd
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via King Drive, 63rd, Calumet, 61st and King Drive due to street blockage near King Drive/62nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via King Drive, 63rd, Calumet, 61st, then resume their normal route on King Drive due to street blockage near King Drive/62nd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th and #7 Harrison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Clinton/Van Buren
ShortDescription: WB 60 Blue Island/26th & 7 Harrison buses are temp rerouted via Clinton, Van Buren, Desplaines & Harrison, due to street blockage near Clinton/Van Buren.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #60 Blue Island/26th and #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Van Buren, Desplaines and Harrison, due to street blockage near Clinton/Van Buren.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
